\u900f\u904e\u640d\u76ca\u6309\u516c\u51.\u82f1\u6587\u540d\u7a31: Current financial assets at fair value through profit or loss

Exchange differences on translation of foreign financial statements subsidiaries accounted for using equity method

\u6b78\u5c6c\u65bc\u6bcd\u516c\u53f8\u69.\u82f1\u6587\u540d\u7a31: Total equity attributable to owners of parent

Losses on financial assets (liabilities) at fair value through profit or loss
